author: LMG Clips
description:
Thanks to our LMG clips sponsors dbrand, Dell, and Secretlab. You can check them out at the links below:

dbrand: https://dbrand.com/pcb
Dell: https://lmg.gg/dellprowanclips
Secretlab: https://lmg.gg/secretlablmgclips

Linus and Luke discuss Micron’s decision to wind down the Crucial brand and what it means for gamers, SSD buyers, and competition in the memory market. They break down how shrinking consumer focus and AI-driven demand could impact DRAM and storage prices in the coming years.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C7RkDtPKZHI

► GET MERCH: https://lttstore.com
► GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE: https://lmg.gg/lttfloatplane

title: Crucial is Dead.
